text:
@DrTedros @gatesfoundation @BillGates @melindagates My small contribution to the fight: https://t.co/cElgohxEC6. 

If you're waiting in line, please post. If you're thinking of going shopping/out, check it & if there's a long line, go at a slower time (when possible). 

The goal is to reduce exposure to #COVID19 .

Stay safe!

domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain
